snippet.title: RPG Time: The Legend of Wright Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Now, it's time for adventure!
A handmade notebook adventure, "RPG Time: The Legend of Wright," is now available!
#RPGTime #Deskworks

SPECIFICATIONS
Title: RPG Time: The Legend of Wright
Genre: Handmade Notebook Adventure
Platform: Xbox Series X|S, Xbox One, Windows
Release: Now Available (Released on March 10, 2022)
Price: $29.99
Players: One
Language: Japanese/English/Simplified Chinese
ESRB : EVERYONE 10+
Developer: DeskWorks Inc.
Publisher: Aniplex Inc.

Official HP: https://rpgtime.en/
Official Twitter: @RPGTimeJP (https://twitter.com/RPGTimeEN)
©DeskWorks / Aniplex
